Posts.Content: Feb 28, 2012 05:21AM kathleen67 wrote: Hi I sometimes get annoyed with people when they discover that I have BC and ask me how I am, they say you look great you would never think and then they going on and tell me about their health problems like I have a sore knee the pain of it.. I would love to say to them I wish that is all I had,, and you can take a pain killer to get rid of the pain. Where us with BC never know what is going on in our bodies, I have had surgery 3 times in 6 weeks if my margins are not clear this time I will be getting the lot removed.. The joys of having a big breast ..
Posts.Title: I was rude ma111 katie31
